description:
Gao Mikado and Kyoya Gaen face each other in the final. With a deck of cards expertly prepared by Baku, Gao makes a strong start as Kyoya is pushed into a corner. But then the tables are turned as the ominous specter of Azi Dahaka envelops the stadium.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Finally! WBC Cup Sekai Taikai Kesshou!!
Finally! WBC Cup World Championships Final Match!
ファイナル! WBCカップ世界大会決勝!!
